Title: Chuyên Viên Chất Lượng (May Mặc) - Quality (QA/QC)
Location: Hai Duong, Hà Nội, Việt Nam, Lô L1, KCN Dệt may Phố Nối B, Dị Sử, Mỹ Hào, Hưng Yên, Lô số L1, KCN Dệt may Phố Nối B, phường Dị Sử, Thị xã Mỹ Hào, Tỉnh Hưng Yên
Job Description:
We are finding Talent for Quality Executive who will be responsible for:
Monitoring and maintaining all quality functions of assigned modules in order to ensure all the processes and product are in the accepted standards complying with customer requirement by fulfilling the company mission and objectives.
1. Assuring the expected quality standards from present output long term.
2. Having a smooth flow of work and minimized inefficiencies by doing things right first time in quality conscious environment.
3. Controlled the levels of defects and minimized failure cost by highly motivated quality team
4. Satisfy the customers by providing excellent quality and on time deliveries regularly.
5. Getting on time feedbacks from customers and third parties regarding the styles produced in reliable manner.
6. Having a motivated and highly skill full work force with strong bottom line to drive continuous improvement.
7. Building a system oriented, customer focused, disciplined team output with effective communication.
8. Quality of service delivered availability.

Title: Smart Logistics Application Expert (Working in Hai Phong)
Location: Hai Phong, Vietnam, Symphony Building, Chu Huy Man Street, Hanoi, Vietnam
Job Description:
Material flow design expert is responsible for material flow design, green & brown field implementation, automation implementation, and project management. As a material flow design expert, you need to :
• Evaluate material flow requirement, such as space/layout, mobile equipment & facilities, route planning, logistics systems, and manning.
• Design material flow proposal for green field or brown field.
• Lead logistics automation implementation.
• Execute logistics project management.
• Design and establish material flow proposal, cover logistics operation from good receiving, put away, storage, kitting & sequence, line feeding, and material transfer between workshops.
• Develop Plan for Every Part (PFEP), material feeding strategy, storage mode evaluation, space requirement calculation, layout, equipment & facilities selection, route planning, systems, manning.
• Alignment with Shop ME / Purchase / Inbound / Packaging teams for efficient Material Flow.
• SOW/SOR, order placement, installation & commissioning (Hi-Bay, mobile equipment, automation facility, supermarket & line racks, racks for kitting/sequencing/delivery to line).
• Be able to propose effective optimization directions for logistics information systems, improve logistics operation efficiency and quality, and reduce logistics operation cost.
• Project feasibility studies.
• Design and establish material flow proposal, cover logistics operation from good receiving, put away, storage, kitting & sequence, line feeding, and material transfer between workshops.
• Develop Plan for Every Part (PFEP), material feeding strategy, storage mode evaluation, space requirement calculation, layout, equipment & facilities selection, route planning, systems, manning.
• Alignment with Shop ME / Purchase / Inbound / Packaging teams for efficient Material Flow.
• SOW/SOR, order placement, installation & commissioning (Hi-Bay, mobile equipment, automation facility, supermarket & line racks, racks for kitting/sequencing/delivery to line).
• Be able to propose effective optimization directions for logistics information systems, improve logistics operation efficiency and quality, and reduce logistics operation cost.
• Responsible for material flow design of green field/brown field, including building & utility requirement, supplier park, logistics strategy, logistics operation mode, investment budget planning & control, warehouse layout, space requirement, process layout analysis, line side position planning, automation implementation, headcount, etc.
• Develop automation equipment selection criteria.
• Lead the conceptual design of logistics automation projects (such as AGV, ASRS, conveyor, robot, etc.). To find the balance between complex layout, process, cost and delivery time constraints, and design simple and durable logistics automation solutions.
• Review and confirm the supplier's technical solutions, including mechanical solutions, electrical control solutions, information system solutions, safety solutions, etc.
• Lead the on-site debugging, problem investigation and resolution of logistics automation project.
• Build the system architecture of logistics automation equipment and interact with production and logistics systems efficiently and stably. Master the latest development trends of logistics automation technology in the industry and always maintain efficiency and creativity.
• Clarify the project input and output requirements, and be able to use simulation technology to model and analyze logistics operation scenarios, improve the efficiency of logistics planning decisions, the accuracy of logistics investment calculations, and the reliability of logistics operation continuous optimization plans;
• Identify failure risks at all stages of the project, provide technical solutions and promote problem solving.
• Project management and implementation, budget management, project time management, support and coordination of project launch and problem solving during implementation

Title: Sales Consultant
Location: 10F, VIT Tower, 519 Kim Ma, Ba Dinh, Hanoi, Vietnam, Hanoi Office: 10F, VIT Tower, 519 Kim Ma, Hanoi, Vietnam
Job Description:
About Us

Established in 2015, Uhomes.com is one of the leading accommodation booking platforms for global students.

Since 2015, Uhomes has an international operation with offices located in the many key cities such as London, New York, Boston, Los Angeles, Beijing, Tianjin, Mumbai, Pune, Kuala Lumpur and operations in over 27 countries or regions. We continue to look for expansion into multiple countries as well as to diversify our property portfolios.

• Website: https://vn.uhomes.com/
• Facebook: www.facebook.com/uhomesvietnam.official

Description

To expand our business scale, we are looking for motivated Sales Consultants to join our team. The role involves assisting students with inquiries, recommending suitable accommodation and ensuring a smooth booking process. Strong communication skills and knowledge of the student housing market are essential. As a Sales Consultant, you will play a key role in growing our business by assisting students and building relationships. Your primary objective will be to convert inquiries into bookings, achieve leasing goals and establish yourself as a regional expert.
This is a full-time, on-site Sales Consultant role at our Hanoi office.
